meanings.definition: relating to or involving the process of transduction
meanings.sent1: The transductional pathway in cells helps convert signals.
meanings.sent2: Her research focused on the transductional mechanisms in biology.
meanings.sent3: The transductional dance of molecules was both fascinating and complex.
meanings.sent4: The transductional journey of information through the body is like a relay race.
meanings.sent5: The transductional process can be compared to a relay baton passing between runners.

meanings.definition: capable of transmitting signals or information through transduction
meanings.sent1: The transductional device efficiently transferred data.
meanings.sent3: The transductional gadget was so effective, it seemed almost magical.
meanings.sent4: The transductional power of the antenna connected people across distances.
meanings.sent5: The transductional ability of the machine was like a bridge between two worlds.
